titleStmt.title: A True copy of the journal of the High Court of Justice for the tryal of K. Charles I as it was read in the House of Commons and attested under the hand of Phelps, clerk to that infamous court / taken by J. Nalson Jan. 4, 1683 : with a large introduction.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649, defendant.
Phelps, John, fl. 1636-1666.
Nalson, John, 1638?-1686.

biblFull.extent: [7], 1xx, [2], 128, [6] p., [3] leaves of plates : ill., port.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.C. for Thomas Dring ...,
